group_1.textLeft: Wheww...@I'm finally out of the Children Area!
Next is the Student Area, right?

group_1.textRight: Keep on doing your best, Ao!
First of all, we've gotta catch up with Yuna and Juri!

group_1.textLeft: I know, I knoww!
But, there's no way to do one's best@in this game of chance...

group_1.textRight: Easy: you just have to learn how to time the wheel.
See, with about this amount of pressure...

group_1.textLeft: Yo, isn't that cheating?

group_1.textRight: Shit...@You're still on top, Sis?

group_1.textLeft: Looks like it, doesn't it?

group_1.textRight: Hmph, think you can take it easy?
Well, let's see just how long you can last before@I fuck you up.

group_1.textLeft: Heh heh, whatever you say...

group_1.textRight: Okay, my turn...!
...Ah! "You received New Year's gift money from@relatives"?!
Yayyy! I can pay back my debt to Juri now!

group_1.textLeft: Whoa, nice timing!
'Cause Juri the Great almost ran into debt too.

group_1.textRight: That's what you get for never thinking twice@before you spend, Juri.

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:102301:cheek_0][chara:102301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:102301:eyeClose_1][chara:102301:lipSynch_1]Pffft.

group_1.textRight: Is something wrong, Ao?

group_1.textLeft: Nope, it's just that I never thought I'd be playing@with these guys.

group_1.textRight: Ah, you were originally at odds with us...

group_1.textLeft: That's not all.

group_1.textRight: Oh?

group_1.textLeft: In the past, I had always liked to play alone.
I used to play mostly solo games and didn't need@friends and stuff.
Though, after starting junior high, I discovered@board games...

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah, board games can only be played@with a good number of people.

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm... Well, there are some that you can play@by yourself.
But what I wanted was to play a multiplayer game...
Therefore, I made a wish to Kyubey to have friends.

group_1.textRight: What?!
Couldn't you just look for someone@to play it with you?!

group_1.textLeft: My mum and dad...
They didn't want me to play games, so I couldn't@invite them...

group_1.textRight: Welp, that makes sense...
...Here and now must be a situation you've never@imagined to be in.

group_1.textLeft: Mm-hm.
(At that time, I was the type of person who didn't@stand out in class.)
(Never had the courage to invite anyone to play@with me.)
(I thought I was lucky to meet Kyubey...)
Being a Magical Girl is a Unique Job.
You get Special Skills to defeat Witches.
The life of a Magical Girl is just like a game, isn't it?

group_1.textRight: Yes, but... with lives at stake, it's not an easy game@to play.

group_1.textLeft: I know...
Unlike ordinary games, if you lose, you really die.
(...To put the Ao Kasane of those days in the context@of the spin-and-move of life...)

group_1.narration: The Player becomes a "Magical Girl"@and obtains Special Skills, lucky her!
She proceeds to the Futatsugi City Area,@a stage full of Witches and Magical Girls.
